oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A certain small portion of the flesh of the Hare is refrained from by the Bushmen. In English, after /han=kasso (L VIII.27. 8398 rev.). The people believe this flesh is from the days when the Hare was formerly a person. 1) This story is found in Book VIII-27.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Eating hare's meat
